item.title: 18L quintals cotton yield expected from Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Cotton Corporation of India (CCI) has officially begun cotton procurement operations in Jogulamba Gadwal district. The inauguration ceremony was held on Tuesday at the Sri Balaji Cotton Ginning Mill, where Marketing Department Officer Pushpamma launched the procurement along with Rahul the CPO of CCI by breaking a coconut in traditional fashion.
According to officials, the district is expecting a yield of around 18 lakh quintals of cotton this season. Currently, only two procurement centers...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
